channel.title: PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: Second PrestaShop Developer Conference - Participate as a Speaker
item.description: Are you a passionate PrestaShop developer or enthusiast? We are happy to announce that the call for presentations is now open for the second edition of the PrestaShop Developer Conference, happening on November 6, 2024. This event offers a prime opportunity to engage in developer discussions, better understand solutions, and connect with fellow community members.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1.7 Is Available
item.description: A new patch for PrestaShop 8.1 is now available! This release includes several significant improvements and numerous bug fixes. In this article, we’ll explore these updates in detail.

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - June 2024
item.description: On June 19th, 2024, we hosted the fifth Live Update of the year. We had the opportunity to talk about PrestaShop 9 and get to know the team working on, among other things, the PrestaShop autoupgrade module.

item.title: Announcing PrestaShop Project Live Update June 2024
item.description: The next Live Update for the PrestaShop Project in 2024 will happen on Wednesday, June 19th, 2024 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube!

item.title: Meet the new API Platform-based API in PrestaShop 9
item.description: A new feature in PrestaShop 9 provides the community a new, secure, modern, and extensible API based on the API Platform. In this article I will show you how to start using it.

item.title: PrestaShop 9 Alpha 1 is Available!
item.description: Here it is. The first public alpha of PrestaShop 9 is available. We decided it was time to share with you the first results of our work on PrestaShop 9.

item.title: Simplifying releases with a single Zip
item.description: As we continue to evolve and adapt to the global e-commerce landscape, we are implementing changes to streamline our operations and enhance our project’s trajectory. In 2022, we aimed to make PrestaShop a company-neutral open source project. Today, while keeping the project neutral, we are changing how we distribute the PrestaShop solution, starting with the upcoming 9.0 release.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1.6 Is Available
item.description: A new patch version for PrestaShop 8.1 is now available. This maintenance release fixes 2 security issues.

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - April 2024
item.description: Participants were able to know about the PrestaShop Performance project, which aims to enhance loading times and reliability of the PrestaShop solution by discovering and tackling key performance issues.

item.title: Announcing PrestaShop Project Live Update April 2024
item.description: The next Live Update for the PrestaShop Project in 2024 will happen on Wednesday, April 17th, 2024 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube!

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1.5 Is Available
item.description: Another patch for PrestaShop 8.1 is available. This release contains interesting improvements as well as a number of bug fixes. In this article, we’ll lean into them because there’s plenty to write about!

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - March 2024
item.description: In our third Live Update this year, we reviewed the already implemented compatibility of PrestaShop with Symfony Framework 6.4, focusing on its impact and the backward incompatible changes it introduces.

item.title: Announcing PrestaShop Project Live Update March 2024
item.description: The third Live Update for the PrestaShop Project in 2024 will happen on Wednesday, March 13th, 2024 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube!

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - February 2024
item.description: With over 250 pull requests merged in the project repositories, February was a busy month for the PrestaShop open source project. We released the security patch, PrestaShop 8.1.4, and made significant progress on the new API. Let’s take a look at the most important changes in the codebase.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1.4 Is Available
item.description: It’s been decided to release a security patch for version 8.1 of PrestaShop.
